questions.question: PQR একটি সমবাহু ত্রিভুজ যার P S ⊥ Q R \mathrm{PS} \perp \mathrm{QR} PS ⊥ QR এবং PQ = 4 সে.মি. ত্রিভুজটির উচ্চতা (PS) কত সে.মি.?

questions.question: 1 + 3 + 5 + 7 + … … 1+3+5+7+\ldots \ldots 1 + 3 + 5 + 7 + …… ধারাটির প্রথম 9 পদের সমষ্টি কত?
questions.explanation: The given series is: 1 + 3 + 5 + 7 + … 1+3+5+7+\ldots 1 + 3 + 5 + 7 + … This is an arithmetic series, where: First term, a = 1 a=1 a = 1 Common difference, d = 2 d=2 d = 2 Number of terms, n = 9 \boldsymbol{n}=9 n = 9 The sum of the first n \boldsymbol{n} n terms of an arithmetic series is given by the formula: S n = n 2 × ( 2 a + ( n − 1 ) d ) S_{n}=\frac{n}{2} \times(2 a+(n-1) d) S n ​ = 2 n ​ × ( 2 a + ( n − 1 ) d ) Substituting the values: S 9 = 9 2 × ( 2 × 1 + ( 9 − 1 ) × 2 ) = 9 2 × ( 2 + 16 ) = 9 2 × 18 = 162 2 = 81 \begin{aligned} S_{9}=\frac{9}{2} & \times(2 \times 1+(9-1) \times 2) \\ & =\frac{9}{2} \times(2+16) \\ & =\frac{9}{2} \times 18 \\ & =\frac{162}{2}=81 \end{aligned} S 9 ​ = 2 9 ​ ​ × ( 2 × 1 + ( 9 − 1 ) × 2 ) = 2 9 ​ × ( 2 + 16 ) = 2 9 ​ × 18 = 2 162 ​ = 81 ​

questions.explanation: এখানে, সমকোণী সমবাহু ত্রিভুজে এর ক্ষেত্রে, cos ⁡ ∠ 45 ∘ = B C A C ⇒ 1 2 = B C 12 ⇒ 12 2 = B C ⇒ B C = 12 2 \begin{array}{l} \cos \angle 4 5^{\circ}=\frac{B C}{A C} \\ \Rightarrow \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}=\frac{B C}{12} \\ \Rightarrow \frac{12}{\sqrt{2}}=B C \\ \Rightarrow B C=\frac{12}{\sqrt{2}} \end{array} cos ∠4 5 ∘ = A C BC ​ ⇒ 2 ​ 1 ​ = 12 BC ​ ⇒ 2 ​ 12 ​ = BC ⇒ BC = 2 ​ 12 ​ ​ ∴ A B = B C = − 12 2 \therefore A B=B C=\frac{-12}{\sqrt{2}} ∴ A B = BC = 2 ​ − 12 ​ ∴ \therefore ∴ ত্রিভুজের ক্ষেত্রফল = 7 2 × A B × B C =\frac{7}{2} \times A B \times B C = 2 7 ​ × A B × BC = 3 2 × 12 2 × 12 2 = 36   c m 2 \begin{array}{l} =\frac{3}{2} \times \frac{12}{\sqrt{2}} \times \frac{12}{\sqrt{2}} \\ =36 \mathrm{~cm}^{2} \end{array} = 2 3 ​ × 2 ​ 12 ​ × 2 ​ 12 ​ = 36   cm 2 ​ Ans

questions.question: যদি a + b = 5 \mathrm{a}+\mathrm{b}=\sqrt{5} a + b = 5 ​ এবং a − b = 3 \mathrm{a}-\mathrm{b}=\sqrt{3} a − b = 3 ​ হয়, তবে a 2 + b 2 = \mathrm{a}^{2}+\mathrm{b}^{2}= a 2 + b 2 = কত?
questions.explanation: We are given: a + b = 5 a − b = 3 \begin{aligned} a+b & =\sqrt{5} \\ a-b & =\sqrt{3} \end{aligned} a + b a − b ​ = 5 ​ = 3 ​ ​ We need to find: a 2 + b 2 = ? a^{2}+b^{2}=? a 2 + b 2 = ? Using the identity: a 2 + b 2 = ( a + b ) 2 + ( a − b ) 2 2 a^{2}+b^{2}=\frac{(a+b)^{2}+(a-b)^{2}}{2} a 2 + b 2 = 2 ( a + b ) 2 + ( a − b ) 2 ​ Substituting the given values: a 2 + b 2 = ( 5 ) 2 + ( 3 ) 2 2 = 5 + 3 2 = 8 2 = 4 \begin{aligned} a^{2}+b^{2} & =\frac{(\sqrt{5})^{2}+(\sqrt{3})^{2}}{2} \\ & =\frac{5+3}{2} \\ & =\frac{8}{2}=4 \end{aligned} a 2 + b 2 ​ = 2 ( 5 ​ ) 2 + ( 3 ​ ) 2 ​ = 2 5 + 3 ​ = 2 8 ​ = 4 ​
